Detailed Description

Display of robot and obstacle configurations in Rviz.

This class implements

  • a tranform broadcaster that broadcasts the position of the robot root link with respect to the global frame "map",
  • a joint state publisher that publishes the joint positions. These joint positions are read by a node of type "robot_state_publisher" that computes the relative positions of all links of the robot. Rviz then displays the positions of the links.
